entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
